title: Day: Big Ten deserves 4 automatic spots in CFP
description: Ohio State coach Ryan Day would like to see future College Football Playoff models include at least four automatic qualifying spots for the expanded Big Ten.
author: Adam Rittenberg

title: Manfred 'paid attention' to Trump support of Rose
description: Rob Manfred took President Donald Trump's support of Pete Rose into account when the MLB commissioner decided that permanent bans by the sport ended with death.

title: How Chelsea won the race to sign £30m Delap
description: Several Premier League clubs made offers to sign Ipswich striker Liam Delap - so why has he opted for Chelsea?

title: Where Swiatek v Sabalenka showdown will be decided
description: The French Open gears up for Iga Swiatek - the reigning champion - against world number one Aryna Sabalenka in the women's semi-finals.

title: 'Team and fans deserve more' - Bright rules herself out of Euros squad
description: England defender Millie Bright has made herself unavailable for selection for the Lionesses' Euro 2025 squad.

title: 'I want to win trophies' - Chelsea complete £30m deal for Delap
description: Chelsea have completed the £30m signing of Ipswich striker Liam Delap.

title: Padres' Yu Darvish continues progressing toward return from inflammation in his pitching elbow
description: Padres right-hander Yu Darvish threw off a mound for a third straight day Wednesday as he continues to progress toward a return from inflammation in his pitching elbow that landed him on the injured list to start the season. Manager Mike Shildt said Darvish would return to San Diego for another bullpen session Friday or Saturday and then the club would determine the next steps in his recovery. The 38-year-old Darvish went on the injured list March 24 and would be pitching in the majors for his 13th season when he's back.
author: JANIE McCAULEY

title: Pirates rookie Mike Burrows shuts down Astros to pick up first major league win in 3-0 victory
description: Pittsburgh's Mike Burrows held Houston in check into the sixth inning to pick up the first victory of his career as the Pirates topped the Astros 3-0 on Wednesday night. Burrows (1-1), whose rise through the Pirates system was slowed by Tommy John surgery in 2023, allowed five hits and struck out six in 5 1/3 innings.
author: WILL GRAVES
